text:
@realDonaldTrump @GOP @senatemajldr 

Handled coronavirus SOOO well.
70K death today
100K deaths by June 1
God knows how many deaths by Nov 3.

The economy in shambles, as if hit repeatedly with a baseball bat.

And TRUMP WILL LOSE IN A LANDSLIDE.

WORST. POTUS. EVER. 

Not. Even. Close.
